text: The Intern is a 2015 American comedy movie co-produced, written, and directed by Nancy Meyers. The movie stars Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway, Rene Russo, Anders Holm, Andrew Rannells, Adam DeVine, Christina Scherer, and Zack Pearlman with Linda Lavin. The movie was released on September 25, 2015 by Warner Bros. ==References== Category:2015 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Intern (2015 movie)
